var.name: precPoints
var.description: the point object dipicting the spatial information of rain gauges

var.name: tmeanPoints
var.description: the point object dipicting the spatial information of weather stations

var.name: tmaxPoints
var.description: the point object dipicting the spatial information of weather stations

var.name: tminPoints
var.description: the point object dipicting the spatial information of weather stations

var.name: EpPoints
var.description: the point object dipicting the spatial information of weather stations

var.name: elevRaster
var.description: a raster object in which elevation of the study area and the header are saved

var.name: slopeDegree2D
var.description: slope(in degree) of the study area

var.name: prec2D
var.description: daily precipitation at each grid of the study area

var.name: Ep2D
var.description: daily reference(potential) evapotranspiration at each grid of the study area

var.name: tmean2D
var.description: daily mean air temperature at each grid of the study area

var.name: tmax2D
var.description: daily maximum air temperature at each grid of the study area

var.name: tmin2D
var.description: daily minimum air temperature at each grid of the study area
